mapper.select: select p.`code` as areaCode, t.creditCode, t.fullName, t.companyProperty, t.belongTo, t.establishDate, t.crewSize, t.areaCodeName, t.registeredCapital, t.fixedAssets, t.workingCapital, t.ownSpace, t.tenancySpace, t.address, t.majorVariety, t.realName, t.lpSex, t.lpBirthDt, t.lpNativePlace, t.lpNationality, t.lpPolitical, t.lpRecruitmentDate, t.lpEducation, t.lpSkillJobTitle, t.lpDeptPost, t.lpIdentityCard, t.lpSocietyPost, t.lpPhone, t.lpMobile, t.postcode, t.fax, t.lpAchievement, t.partyCategory, t.partyPeoples, t.partyCrtDt, t.partyDutyMan, t.partyPhone, t.unionCrtDt, t.unionDutyMan, t.unionPhone, t.laborContractNum, t.thirdLaborRelation, t.socialInsuranceAddr, t.socialInsuranceNum, t.reemployContribution, t.educationContribution, t.helpPoorContribution, t.otherContribution, t.lpResume from com_data_import t left join portal.province p on p.fullname = t.areaCodeName limit 1
